attributes.action: Make it law for employers to give flexible hours to lone parents with children under 15.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Lone parents with children over 6 dont have the entitlement to flexi-hours in the workplace..Lone parents want to work!!! but we cant do nights and wkends ie. out of school hours.. A 7-15year old cant stay at home alone by law... Please make flexi-hours law in the workplace for lone parents with children under 15 years. A lot more of us could work then.
